attributes.action: Close the wide pay gap in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are living in an immoral country that applauds already highly paid individuals getting million pound bonuses, and company directors with million pound plus salaries, when there are still so many people in Britain who will not earn a million pounds in their entire working life!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
